Package com.company.Database.Users

Interface UsersDataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCUsersDataSource, UsersNDS
public interface UsersDataSource

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    Adds a User to the datebase, if they are not already in the datebase
    void changePassword​(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.Integer userID)
    Changes the user's password
    boolean checkPassword​(java.lang.Integer userID, java.lang.String hashedPassword)  
    java.lang.Boolean checkUsernameAvailability​(java.lang.String username)
    Checks if a username is available based on the username passed in
    void close()
    Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisited.
    void deleteUser​(java.lang.Integer userID)
    Deletes a User from the database.
    void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Deletes a User from the database.
    User getUser​(java.lang.Integer userID)
    Extracts all the details of a User from the database based on the userID passed in.
    User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Extracts all the details of a User from the database based on the userID passed in.
    boolean login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hashedPassword)  
    java.util.Set<User> userSet()
    Retrieves a set of usernames from the data source that are used in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser​(User user)
      Adds a User to the datebase, if they are not already in the datebase
      Parameters:
      user - User to add

    • changePassword

      void changePassword​(java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.Integer userID)
      Changes the user's password
      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password that the user wants
      userID - the ID of the user that wants to change their password

    • getUser

      User getUser​(java.lang.Integer userID)
      Extracts all the details of a User from the database based on the userID passed in.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID as a Integer to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in a User object for the UserID

    • checkUsernameAvailability

      java.lang.Boolean checkUsernameAvailability​(java.lang.String username)
      Checks if a username is available based on the username passed in
      Parameters:
      username - The username as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      boolean value of username availability

    • getUser

      User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Extracts all the details of a User from the database based on the userID passed in.
      Parameters:
      username - The username as a String to search for.
      Returns:
      all details in a User object for the username

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser​(java.lang.Integer userID)
      Deletes a User from the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID to delete from the database.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Deletes a User from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to delete from the database.

    • close

      void close()
      Finalizes any resources used by the data source and ensures data is persisited.

    • userSet

      java.util.Set<User> userSet()
      Retrieves a set of usernames from the data source that are used in the database.
      Returns:
      set of usernames.

    • login

      boolean login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hashedPassword)

    • checkPassword

      boolean checkPassword​(java.lang.Integer userID, java.lang.String hashedPassword)
